CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 16, 1957, pg. 3, reads: "Modern Plumbing? - This is the second-floor bathroom at 1015 Western Ave. Note the leak from the bottom of the toilet; the hole under the dismantled bathtub's leg; the plywood boards which reinforce holes in single-ply floor.  Leak falls into not-much-better bathroom on first floor below. [2001.35.45934].  You can see through several holes in floor into bathroom on first floor."
TitMainTitle: Interior of dilapidated bathroom with leaking toilet, stained paneling, and claw foot bathtub seated on missing floor, in 1015 Western Avenue, Northside
